mapper.select: SELECT DATE(create_time) as date, mood_tag as mood, COUNT(*) as count FROM diary WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 AND create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 365 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(create_time), mood_tag ORDER BY date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE diary SET content = #{content}, mood_tag = #{moodTag}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
